summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- Issue: The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test.
  Recommendation: Investigate the causes of the failure, such as large resource requests, slow server response time, or render-blocking resources. Optimize these issues to improve the page's performance.

issues.recommendation: The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test.
The First Contentful Paint (FCP) on the homepage is relatively high (409.69 ms).
The Time to First Byte (TTFB) on the pricing page is slightly higher (38.79 ms) than on the other pages.

insights: Key insight 1: The homepage has the longest load time (494.6 ms) among the passed tests, suggesting that there is room for optimization.
Key insight 2: The blog page has the lowest TTFB (71.6 ms) and FCP (213 ms), indicating efficient server response and content rendering.
Key insight 3: The pricing page has a significantly lower FCP (184.39 ms) than the homepage (409.69 ms), highlighting the importance of optimizing above-the-fold content for better user experience.
